entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 12:31 PM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 12:31 PM MST Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 12:31 PM MST Monday 3 April 2023
